Content: 25turn over    	do not write in this area	do not write in this area	do not write in this area	do not write in this area	do not write in this area	do not write in this area*p50784a02528*	*(h)	 antioxidants are widely used as ingredients in dietary supplements.  however, ‘clinical trials have failed to clearly express an advantage of these dietary supplements’ (paragraph 26).		suggest how a clinical trial should be designed to investigate the advantage of using antioxidants in dietary supplements.(6)	(i)	 suggest how the action of enzymatic antioxidants differs from that of non‑enzymatic antioxidants (paragraphs 27 and 28).(1)
